text: Sir Emmanuel Neville Cenac, GCSL, GCMG (born 24 November 1939)http://www.govt.lc/media.govt.lc/www/resources/publications/neville- cenac-cv-final--1-.pdf is the Governor-General of Saint Lucia since 2018. He was appointed to that post in January 2018.He left his post in November 2021 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Governors- General of Saint Lucia
title: Neville Cenac
